product_name: Pearl Izumi ELITE LTD Bike Jersey - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Pedal your way to some fun in the sun in the Pearl Izumi ELITE LTD bike jersey. It offers excellent performance in warm weather, keeping you comfortable no matter the length or intensity of the ride. Soft fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly to maximize comfort; side mesh panels increase air circulation. Fabric provides UPF 40 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Full-length zipper provides quick ventilation control. Three back pockets stash food and other essentials. The Pearl Izumi ELITE LTD bike jersey has a formfitting cut to minimize wind drag. Closeout.
short_description: Pedal your way to some fun in the sun in the Pearl Izumi ELITE LTD bike jersey. It offers excellent performance in warm weather, keeping you comfortable no matter the length or intensity of the ride.
